title: Bread machine pretzels
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) beer', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '380g (13 oz) plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon dried active baking yeast', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon warm water', '2 tablespoons sea salt flakes, such as Maldon sea salt']
